name: Sunny Spot Breeders
description:
Instructions:

Press Space and hold it while facing a monster to pick it up, and use arrow keys or WASD to move! Press Space by the switch to open and close the door, and place two monsters in the breeding room for a new monster to be born! When a customer goes to the counter it will ask for a monster, so pick up a monster and bring it to the counter! Also, Press R to restart.

Description:

I made this game for the seventh Brackeys Game Jam! This was the first time I competed in a game jam so I hope you like it! I recommend playing this game in full-screen too.
